Get Season Statistics by Player

cfb_stats_season_player.Rd

Get Season Statistics by Player

cfb_stats_season_player(
  year,
  season_type = "regular",
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  start_week = NULL,
  end_week = NULL,
  category = NULL
)

Arguments

year

(Integer required): Year, 4 digit format (YYYY)
season_type

(String default both): Select Season Type: regular, postseason, or both.
team

(String optional): D-I Team
conference

(String optional): Conference abbreviation - Select a valid FBS conference
Conference abbreviations P5: ACC, B12, B1G, SEC, PAC
Conference abbreviations G5 and FBS Independents: CUSA, MAC, MWC, Ind, SBC, AAC
start_week

(Integer optional): Starting Week - values range from 1-15, 1-14 for seasons pre-playoff, i.e. 2013 or earlier
end_week

(Integer optional): Ending Week - values range fom 1-15, 1-14 for seasons pre-playoff, i.e. 2013 or earlier
category

(String optional): Category filter (e.g defensive)
Offense: passing, receiving, rushing
Defense: defensive, fumbles, interceptions
Special Teams: punting, puntReturns, kicking, kickReturns

Examples


cfb_stats_season_player(year=2018, conference = 'B12', start_week = 1,end_week = 7)
#> # A tibble: 882 x 52
#>    athlete_id player team  conference category passing_INT passing_PCT
#>    <chr>      <chr>  <chr> <chr>      <chr>    <chr>       <chr>      
#>  1 3886634    Alex … Kans… Big 12     passing  2           0.474      
#>  2 4039230    Brend… West… Big 12     passing  0           1.000      
#>  3 4036419    Skyla… Kans… Big 12     passing  3           0.553      
#>  4 4034332    Micha… TCU   Big 12     passing  0           0.429      
#>  5 4035525    Zeb N… Iowa… Big 12     passing  1           0.636      
#>  6 3125121    Jerro… Texas Big 12     passing  0           1.000      
#>  7 3127200    Tre W… Texas Big 12     passing  0           1.000      
#>  8 3676833    KaVon… TCU   Big 12     passing  1           0.000      
#>  9 3139470    Jah'S… Texa… Big 12     passing  0           1.000      
#> 10 4360326    Pooka… Kans… Big 12     passing  0           0.000      
#> # … with 872 more rows, and 45 more variables: passing_COMPLETIONS <chr>,
#> #   passing_YPA <chr>, passing_YDS <chr>, passing_ATT <chr>, passing_TD <chr>,
#> #   receiving_TD <chr>, receiving_YPR <chr>, receiving_REC <chr>,
#> #   receiving_YDS <chr>, receiving_LONG <chr>, rushing_CAR <chr>,
#> #   rushing_YPC <chr>, rushing_TD <chr>, rushing_YDS <chr>, rushing_LONG <chr>,
#> #   fumbles_FUM <chr>, fumbles_LOST <chr>, fumbles_REC <chr>,
#> #   kicking_XPM <chr>, kicking_XPA <chr>, kicking_FGM <chr>, kicking_PTS <chr>,

#> #   kickReturns_TD <chr>, kickReturns_NO <chr>, kickReturns_AVG <chr>,
#> #   kickReturns_LONG <chr>, kickReturns_YDS <chr>, punting_TB <chr>,
#> #   punting_LONG <chr>, punting_YPP <chr>, punting_NO <chr>,
#> #   punting_In20 <chr>, punting_YDS <chr>, puntReturns_TD <chr>,
#> #   puntReturns_YDS <chr>, puntReturns_NO <chr>, puntReturns_AVG <chr>,

cfb_stats_season_player(2019, team = 'LSU', category = 'passing')
#> # A tibble: 2 x 12
#>   athlete_id player team  conference category passing_PCT passing_YPA
#>   <chr>      <chr>  <chr> <chr>      <chr>    <chr>       <chr>      
#> 1 3915511    Joe B… LSU   SEC        passing  0.779       10.7       
#> 2 4242210    Myles… LSU   SEC        passing  0.568       8.5        
#> # … with 5 more variables: passing_ATT <chr>, passing_INT <chr>,
#> #   passing_COMPLETIONS <chr>, passing_YDS <chr>, passing_TD <chr>
